item.title: Vampyre Slayer Dialouge
item.dc:creator: @XenoForce XenoForce
item.description:
@XenoForce wrote:

All of you should Remember the old quest killing Count. Draynor right?
Well if you remember right the dialogue is hard to remember with all the running around as a F2P player

Well, here is the Dialogue for the whole thing, not 100% some parts can be claimed alot easier and done alot faster.
[size=10pt]Please don’t Flame…[/size]
Add this somewhere in Dialoguehandler class

[code]case 50:
sendNpcChat1(“Praise Saradomin! He has brought you here to save us all.”, 755, “Morgan”);
c.nextChat = 35;
break;
case 51:
sendPlayerChat1(“Wha-”);
c.nextChat = 36;
break;
case 52:
sendNpcChat4("He has guided your steps to my door, so that i may beseech you to save my village from a terrible threat! ", 755, “Morgan”);
c.nextChat = 37;
break;
case 53:
sendPlayerChat1(“What terrible threat?”);
c.nextChat = 38;
break;

            case 54:
                    sendNpcChat1("Our village is plagued by a Vampyre. He visits us frequently and demands Blood payments or he will terrorise us all!", 755, "Morgan");
                    c.nextChat = 39;
                    break;
            case 55:
                    sendPlayerChat1("This vampyre showed up all of a sudden and started attacking you village?");
                    c.nextChat = 40;
                    break;
            case 56:
                    sendNpcChat1("I don't know, I jus moved here with my wife. We'd move on again, but we're down on our luck and can't afford to.", 755, "Morgan");
                    c.dialogueAction = 41;
                    break;
            case 57:
                    sendNpcChat1("Besides, I don't want to abandon other innocents to this fate. This could be a good community, if only that Vampyre would leave us.", 755, "Morgan");
                    c.nextChat = 42;
                    break;
            case 58:
                    sendNpcChat4("Will you help me, Brave adventurer?", 755, "Morgan");
                    c.nextChat = 43;
                    break;
            case 59:
                    sendOption2("Yes.", "No.");
                    c.nextChat = 44;
                    break;
            case 60:
                    sendNpcChat4("Wonderfull You will succeed, I'm sure of it. You are very brave to take this on, but i think you should speak to my friend Hawlo before you do anything else.", 755, "Morgan");
                    c.nextChat = 45;
                    break;
            case 61:
                    sendPlayerChat1("Who is this... Harlow?");
                    c.nextChat = 46;
                    break;
			case 62:
                    sendNpcChat4("He is a retired Vampyre Slayer! I met him when I was a Missionary, Long ago. He will be able to advise you on the best methods to vanquish this Vampyre.", 755, "Morgan");
					c.nextchat = 47;
					break;
			case 63:
                    sendPlayerChat1("You already know a vampyre slayer? What do you need me for?"
                    c.nextchat = 48;
					break;
			case 64:
                    sendNpcChat4("Harlow is...past his prime. He's seen too many evil things in his life and, to forget them, he drinks himself to oblivion. I fear he will slay Vampyres no more.", 755, "Morgan");	
					c.nextchat = 49;
					break;
			case 65:	
					sendPlayerChat1("Where can i find this Harlow?");
					c.nextchat = 50;
					break;
			case 66:
					sendNpcChat4("He spends his time at Blue Moon inn, Located in Varrock. If you endter Varrock from the south it is the second building on your right. I'm sure it's filled with lively people, so you shouldn't miss it", 755, "Morgan");
					c.nextchat = 51;
					break;
			case 67:	
					sendPlayerChat1("Okay, I'll go find Harlow.");
					c.nextchat = 52;
					break;
			case 68:
					sendNpcChat4("May Saradomin protect you, my friend!", 755, "Morgan");
					c.nextchat = -1;
					break;
			case 69:		
					sendNpcChat4("Buy me a drink pleassh.", 756, "Dr Harlow");
					c.nextchat = 70;
					break;
			case 70:
					sendPlayerChat4("Are you Dr Harlow, The Famous Vampyre Slayer?");
					c.nextchat = 71;
					break;
			case 71:
					sendNpcChat1("Dependsh whose ashking.", 756, "Dr Harlow");
					c.nextchat = 72;
					break;
			case 72:
					sendPlayerChat4("Your friend Morgan sent me. He said you could teach me how to slay a Vampyre.");
					c.nextchat = 73;
					break;
			case 73:
					sendNpcChat1("Shure, i can teach you. I wash the best Vampyre Shhlayer ever.". 756, "Dr Harlow");
					c.nextchat = 74;
					break;
			case 74:
					sendNpcChat1("Buy me a beer and I'll Teash you.", 756, "Dr Harlow");
					c.nextchat = 75;
					break;
			case 75:	
					sendPlayerChat4("Your good friend. Morgan is living in fear of a Vampyre and all you can think about is beer?");
					c.nextchat = 76;
					break;
			case 76:
					sendNpcChat1("Buy ush a drink anyway.", 756, "Dr Harlow");
					c.nextchat = 77;
					break;
			case 77:
					sendPlayerChat4("Okay, here you got.");
					c.nextchat = 78;
					break;
			case 78:
					sendNpcChat1("Cheersh, Matey.", 756, "Dr Harlow");
					c.nextchat = 79;
					break;
			case 79:
					sendPlayerChat4("So, tell me how to kill Vampires then.");
					c.nextchat = 80;
					break;
			case 80:
					sendNpcChat1("Yes, yes, Vampyres. I was very good at killing em' once", 756, "Dr Harlow");
					c.nextchat = 81;
					break;
			case 81:
					sendNpcChat1("Vampyre slaying is not to be undertaken lightly. You must go in prepared, or you will die.", 756, "Dr Harlow");
					c.nextchat = 82;
					break;
			case 82:
					sendNpcChat1("*Sigh*", 756, "Dr Harlow");
					c.nextchat = 83;
					break;
			case 83:
					sendNpcChat1("A Stake is an essential tool for any Vampyre slayer. The stake must be used in the final blow against the Vampyre or his dark magic will regenerate him to full health.", 756, "Dr Harlow");
					c.nextchat = 84;
					break;
			case 84:
					sendNpcChat1("I always carry a spare, so you can have one, and a hammer.");
					c.getitem(1549, 1);
					c.getitem(2347, 1);
					c.nextchat = 85;
					break;
			case 85:
					sendNpcChat1("One last thing. It's Wise to carry Garlic with you; Vampyres are slightly weakend if they can smell garlic", 756, "Dr Harlow");
					c.nextchat = 86;
					break;
			case 86:
					sendNpcChat1("Garlic is pretty common, I know I always advised Morgan to keep a supply, so you mught be able to get soem from him. If not, I know they sell it in Port Sarim", 756, "Dr Harlow");
					c.nextchat = 87;
					break;
			case 87:
					sendPlayerChat4("Okay, so those are the supplies I need, but how do I actually kill him?");
					c.nextchat = 88;
					break;
			case 88:
					sendNpcChat1("You are an Eager one.", 756, "Dr Harlow");
					c.nextchat = 89;
					break;
			case 89:
					sendNpcChat1("Killing a Vampyre is DANGEROUS! Never forget that. Go in prepared, with food and armour, but understand that you may die. It's a a risk we all take in this buisness.", 756, "Dr Harlow");
					c.nextchat = 90;
					break;
			case 90:
					sendNpcChat1("I've seen many fine men and women die at the hands of Vampyres.", 756, "Dr Harlow");
					c.nextchat = 91;
					break;
			case 91:
					sendNpcChat1("Enter the vampyre's lair and attempt to open the coffin. He should be asleep there, so try to use the stake on him. As you're new at this, you'll probaly just waje him up and the real fight begins.", 756, "Dr Harlow");
					c.nextchat = 92;
					break;
			case 92:
					sendNpcChat1("Fight him until he's nearly dead, and when the moment is right, stake him throught the heart and hammer is in.", 756, "Dr Harlow");
					c.nextchat = 93;
					break;
			case 93:
					sendNpcChat1("It's gruesome, but it's the only way. Once he's dead, speak to Morgan so he can notify the Vilage.", 756, "Dr Harlow");
					c.nextchat = 94;
					break;
			case 94:
					sendPlayerChat4("Thank you very much!");
					c.nextchat = -1;
					break;
			case 95:
					sendPlayerChat4("I've slain the Vampyre!");
					c.nextchat = 96;
					break;
			case 96:
					sendNpcChat("Praise Saradomin! Bless you! We are all saved the vampyre is slain!", 755, "Morgan");
					c.nextchat = -1;
					c.getitem(995, 15000);
					c.getxp(1, 38600);
					break;	
            }
    }

[/code]
Here’s your Dialouge, Have a nice day(:

Read full topic
